query:
SELECT
            c."id" as "item_id!",
            c."createdAt" as "created_at!",
            c."updatedAt" as "updated_at!",
            c."deletedAt" as "deleted_at?",
            uh."updatedAt" as "viewed_at?",
            c."projectId" as "project_id?"
        FROM
            "Chat" c
        LEFT JOIN
            "UserHistory" uh ON uh."itemId" = c."id"
                AND uh."userId" = $1
                AND uh."itemType" = 'chat'
        WHERE
            c."id" = ANY($2)
        ORDER BY
            c."updatedAt" DESC
